name: Spiced Tomato Soup
description: Indian Spiced Tomato Soup. Clear your sinuses tomato soup to warm you up in fall. Easy homemade vegan tomato soup seasoned with cumin, coriander and Turmeric. Vegan gluten-free Soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup chopped carrot (or 1 medium carrot, chopped)
1/4 tsp black pepper ( or a combination of black and white pepper)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. When hot, add cumin and cook for 1 minute or until the cumin seeds get fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. When hot, add cumin and cook for 1 minute or until the cumin seeds get fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chopped onions, garlic, carrot and a pinch of salt. Cook for 4 to 5 minutes or until onions are translucent. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chopped onions, garlic, carrot and a pinch of salt. Cook for 4 to 5 minutes or until onions are translucent. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add coriander, turmeric, cayenne and pepper, mix for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add coriander, turmeric, cayenne and pepper, mix for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the onion mixture to a blender. Add tomatoes and blend until pureed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the onion mixture to a blender. Add tomatoes and blend until pureed.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the pureed tomato mixture back to the saucepan. Add water, bay leaf, salt and sugar and cook over medium heat for 12 to 14 minutes. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and heat. Add more water if needed. Garnish with chives and Serve with crusty bread or croutons or grilled vegan cheese sandwiches.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the pureed tomato mixture back to the saucepan. Add water, bay leaf, salt and sugar and cook over medium heat for 12 to 14 minutes. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and heat. Add more water if needed. Garnish with chives and Serve with crusty bread or croutons or grilled vegan cheese sandwiches.
